regexpForTabsHelp.message:
Insert regular expressions for web addresses here. Matching tabs will be automatically moved to this group.
Use one line per rule, there can be as many as you want.
Examples:
github\.com/drive4ik/simple-tab-groups - catch all pages in the add-on's repository
bugzilla\.mozilla\.org - catch Firefox bug reports
(facebook|twitter|youtube)\.com - catch all your social pages

helpPageWelcomeDescription.message:
Please enable "Open previous windows and tabs" in browser settings.
This is necessary to maintain communication between the group and the tab,
otherwise the tabs will not open when the browser starts and will be lost from the addon -
the addon will stop working.
helpPageWelcomeDescription.description:
Please enable "Open previous windows and tabs" in browser settings.
This is necessary to maintain communication between the group and the tab,
otherwise the tabs will not open when the browser starts and will be lost from the addon -
the addon will stop working.

loggingIsAutoEnabledTitle.message: logging was auto-enabled due to an error in addon
loggingIsAutoEnabledTitle.description: logging was auto-enabled due to an error in addon

loggingDescription.message:
Please enable this checkbox only if you need to record bug and send logs to me. Enabling this checkbox will lead to a noticeable slowdown of the addon, as all addon actions are logged. When you reproduce the error, turn off this checkbox, and the addon will offer to save the log file. This option can be enabled by itself if an error occurs. You need to disable the DEBUG checkbox and save the log file.
Please send this log file to me by email: drive4ik+stg@protonmail.com
Attention! There are no personal data, passwords, bookmarks etc., in this log file!
This is necessary to be able to reproduce the problem and try to fix it.
Best regards

stgHostHowToUse.message: To select any folder on your computer to save tab group backups, you need the Simple Tab Groups Host program. How to set it up: 1. Download the STGHost.exe program to any folder on your computer 2. Run the program and set the path for saving backups 3. If necessary, change other parameters in the program settings Important: If you have moved the program to another folder, you need to run it once so that Firefox recognizes the new location. After configuration, the program will automatically run in the background and accept commands from the extension and this message will disappear.
stgHostHowToUse.description: How to install and use the STGHost program

helpPageHowToGithubGistTitle.message: Configuring STG synchronization via GitHub Gist
helpPageHowToGithubGistTitle.description: Configuring STG synchronization via GitHub Gist

helpPageHowToGithubGistWhatIsDesc.message:
This is to synchronize your tabs and Simple Tab Groups settings between two or more computers.
Your data will be stored in a GitHub Gist file. This file will be private. Apart from you, no one will have access to it unless you yourself provide a GitHub Gist link to this data to another person. STG will only send this data to your GitHub account.

helpPageHowToGithubGistHowSetupQ.message: How do I set up synchronization?
helpPageHowToGithubGistHowSetupQ.description: How do I set up synchronization?

helpPageHowToGithubGistCreateAccount.message: You need to create a GitHub account (if you don't have one)

helpPageHowToGithubGistCreateTokenDesc.message: You need to create a private token in your GitHub account. The token should only be stored by you and in the STG settings. It will be used to transfer your tabs to your GitHub account.

helpPageHowToGithubGistCreateTokenPermis.message: The token must be given permission to write data to Gist!

helpPageHowToGithubGistTokenPersonal.message: Create fine-grained personal access token. See example.
